This project is a React Native (Expo) mobile app for a fitness social network called GymBuddy. Use best practices for cross-platform mobile development, modular folder structure, and Firebase integration for backend services. Prioritize user authentication, profile management, swipe-based matching, chat, and gym check-in features.
